                            map by p1n0.....

///----- G E R M A N -----
Die CTs und Ts müssen den Barrieren durch springen oder ducken ausweichen. Dabei läuft die 

Zeit ab. Je länger man in der Arena bleibt, desto besser wird die Waffe die man bekommt. Wird 

man von einer Barriere erwischt, kommt man in die jeweilige Zelle mit der entsprechenden 

Waffe. 

Hält man 130 Sekunden oder bis zu Minute 2 durch, kommt man in den "Kingroom". Im 

"Kingroom" bekommt man 50% mehr Geschwindigkeit und man heilt sich automatisch überall. 

Außerdem kann man zwischen vielen guten Waffen wählen.

Nachdem kein Spieler mehr in der Arena ist, werden alle Spieler auf eine zweite Map 

teleportiert, auf der sich anschließend alle mit ihren erworbenen Waffen bekämpfen, bis ein 

Team gewonnen hat.


///
Tricks / Versteckte Dinge / Besonderheiten:

-Am Anfang gibt es einen Button, den jeder drücken kann und wodurch die Geschwindigkeit um 

25% für diese Person erhöht wird, zudem wird ein zufälliger Sound abgespielt.

-Am Anfang gibt es zwei Laser, die das Gameplay erschweren, die aber nach 65 Sekunden 

verschwinden
-Zwei Tafeln zeigen den Namen der Waffe an, bei der man sich momentan befindet
-Die Console zeigt per Nachrichten immer den momentanen Stand und verschiedene 

Informationen an
-Auf einem Monitor kann man die ganze Map im Überlick sehen

-Auf der zweiten Map gibt es Granaten, die nach bestimmter Zeit respawnen

-Auf der zweiten Map gibt es eine Noobbox, in die man kommt wenn man in das Wasser fällt. 

Darin hat man keine Orientierung und kann von außen abgeschossen werden.

-Auf der zweiten Map gibt es verschiedene geheimen Tricks, wie eine Heilzone oder Teleporter, 

die den Spieler in günstigere Positionen versetzen




///Informationen:
-Es dürften keine Bugs vorhanden sein und die Map sollte problemlos laufen. Dies ist die Version 

1.0.


///----- E N G L I S H -----
The CTs and Ts have to dodge by ducking under or jumping over the barriers. It runs out of 

time. If you stay long in the arena, your weapon you get will be better. If you are caught by a 

barrier, you get into that cell with the appropriate weapon.
There are 130 seconds or up to 2 minutes through, one comes to the "King Room". The "King 

Room" gets you 50% more speed and you will heal you automatically everywhere. You can also 

choose from many good weapons.
When no player is more in the arena, all players will be teleported to a second map, then they 

haveto fight with their acquired weapons, until one team has won.

///Tricks / hidden things / features:
 -In the beginning, there is a button that you can push and that increased your speed to 25% for 

this person. There will also play a random sound.
-In the beginning there are two lasers, which complicate the gameplay, but disappear after 65 

seconds
-Two panels show the  which it is currently name of the weapon
-The console displays messages an the current status and various information
-On a monitor you can see the whole map in overview
-On the second map, there are grenades that spawn after a certain time
-On the second map, there is a Noobbox in which you get when you fall into the water. This 

Person one has no information in the box and could be fired from outside.
-On the second map, there are various tricks and secrets, like a healing zone or teleporters that 

will enable the players into more favorable positions
 
///Informations:
-There should be no bugs present and the map should run smoothly

My Created Jump map.

You get spawned in a glass box with a knife and a usp. You break the glass and fall onto a platform. A trigger_once activates a timer and the rotating object. If you survive long enough you get teleported to the space and lava room. Your speed increases in that room and you can pick up grenades and a deagle and kill each other. Also the grenades and the deagle have env_spritetrails on them!! (they leave trails of light on them)

A CSS Vehicles test map based on de_jeepathon2k from 1.6 This is ONE OF THE FIRST if not The 1st map with drivable vehicles for CSS !! I will be improving the vehicles and releasing them to the public, also I protected the map so you guys wont decompile it until I IMPROVE THE VEHICLES AND RELEASE THEM To the public :D -Note Vehicles are giltchy so try not to drive to fast or you will kill yourself -To drive the vehicles press the control panel with E and accelerate holding mouse1 and steer with your WASD keys, atix deathrace car shoots with mouse2 after pressing the red button. -Break the 1000hp wall with the deathrace car to bust out :D -Also a shout thanks to Natalya[AF] and the original creator of de_jeepathon2k from 1.6 ~Enjoy Set this command in your server or CFG if you do not want to fall thru the cars: sv_turbophysics 0 haha Good times, I WILL BE UPGRADING THIS MAP TO Version2, please submit random ideas to improve gameplay

A old map of mine where the cts must work as a team to defend the coming hordes of sharks (played by t) before they destroy the support beams holding them up from danger, Using grenades and other useful equipment lying around if cts fail to defend they will plundge into the water and drown while being eaten by the sharks.

Thanks to solid snake for creating me that harpoon cannon.

So i finally released it! 

To win you have to dodge duck dip dive and dodge through this course.. have fun!

This is a fix for mgjacsmultigamefix, which is a multigame map like mgallinonexivzfix or mghellzmultigamefix.

The fixes/changes are as follows: -
Removed Zombies vs You mode (Really unfair), Removed porn, Removed lag, No more flashlight bugs, And you can now see well in maps that were very dark.

It's a lot of fun and has fourteen different levels that you race to choose from.

Race - race to the end (by jumping and strafing) for an AWP
AWP - two castles face each other, snipe each other to win
Slide - strafe around two slide lvl's to end where an m3 waits
Mario - race upwards as poison water follows you, don't fall!
Knife Arena - one knifer vs another knifer
Jump Rope - keep jumping as the jump rope gets faster, losers sit back and watch
Falling Jump - jump over rods as the floor below you starts to break
Balance - six wobbly platforms, nades in the middle
Shotgun - a map full of speed boosts, falling boxes and shotguns
50 HP - you have 50hp and a knife on a basketball court
Strafe - fall down and around and through the holes for three lvl's
Scoutz Knifez - low gravity and scouts and knifes
Ice Skating - skate around and if you're lucky, get the nades and m3
Nade - a grenade arena with grenades obviously

Oh, and if you are wondering what the sweet songs are that randomly play in the background, here they are: 1. Lion King - I Just Can't Wait to be King 2. Ben Folds - Bitch Went Nuts 3. Dan Band - Total Eclipse of the Heart 4. Band of Horses - The Funeral 5. Goofy Movie - Eye to Eye 6. Weebl - Amazing Horse 7. Shiny Toy Guns - Major Tom 8. Crystal Castles - Vanished 9. Verve Pipe / Jay Z - Bittersweet Symphony vs Brush Your Shoulder Off

This is a mg/aim map.
20 CT vs 20 T

Current version: v6b

The objective of the map is to kill oposite force using weapons and items.
To get an item, take the knife inside. When you get the item you will also get a pistol.
Strong itmes gives weak pistols (glock), weak items gives strong pistols (desert eagle).

The items are:

Shelby car (2):
Car gives speed to the player who wears it. (Speed x2)
Gives dual elites.

JetPack (2):
The jetpack allows player to fly.
To fly: Use knife secondary attack.
To fly forward: look at the ground.
To fly backwards: look at the sky.
Don't worry if you fall, you will not die.
The jetpack has a Gas tank, when you fly will use the gas, to restore the gas wait, a HUD text will show you the status of the jetpack.
Gives dual elites.

Medkit (2):
Restores player and teammates health (20hp each second).
Gives desert eagle.

Mega Laser Dual(2):
Very dangerous.
You can shot laser each 3,5 seconds, when the laser is ready, you will see sparks on the lasers canon.
Caution laser can be used to kill enemies and teammates.
To shot use the knife secondary attack.
Gives glock.

Dual Rocket Launcher (2):
Shots 2 explsive rockets at the same time. Very destructive.
Each rocketlauncher has 4 rockets in their clip, to reload rockets wait and dont shoot, a HUD text will notice the numbers of rockets.
Do not fire at a near target or you will die.
To shot use the knife secodary attack.
Gives glock.

Canon (1):
This canon can shot one ball each one second (not explosive).
The canon can be used to kill enemies or teammates.
To shot use the knife secondary attack.
Gives usp.

Flamethrower(2):
Burn enemies!!!
Unlimited attack, short range.
To fire use knife secondary attack.
Doesnt hurt teammates.
Gives usp.

Heavy armor (2):
Protects against weapons and some against items.
Decreases the field of wiev.
The vulnerable area is the head.
The back is invulnerable.
Gives desert eagle.

Wizards staff (1):
Shots a explosive fireball, it destroys everything along its path.
You can use the staff when the light is on.
To make magic use the knife secondary attack.
Gives glock.

Reflector shield (2) NEW:
Reflects all item attacks except the flamethrower and the freezer.
Also reflects teammates attacks.
Does not give protection against bulets.
Gives usp.

Freezer gun (1) NEW:
Freezes enemies during 8 seconds.
Is not very effective against the shelby item.
Gives desert eagle.

Ubercharger (1) NEW:
Makes player and near teammates immortal during 8 seconds.
wait 22 seconds to use another time.
Gives usp.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Changelog

--V1--

First release

--V2--

Players will spawn with Desert eagle, knifes are in the items.
Now the map has ambient light and new skybox.
Solved tank armor bug, now armor activates the 100% of times.
Upgraded tank armor.
Introduced a button to activate/deacitvate the jetpacks.
Now items cant be dropped and only can be used 1 time each round.
Sphere of life now gives x2 HP.
Items from each team will not work for the enemy force.

--V2.1--

Players increased to 20

--v3--

-New map, now is bigger than first.
-20 weapons scattered arround the map.
-Solved bugs:
--Deleted tank (crash server).
--Deleted armor box (crash server).
--Solved jetpack bug.

--v4--

-Maxplayers incrased to 32
-New items
-Increased map size
-Added HDR
-New models

--v4b--

-Solved bugs
-Improved HDR

--V5--
-Spehere of live updated to medkit, now can health teammates
-Fixed old fast attack bug at rocketlauncher
-Dual Rocket launcher can shot 8 rockets (1 each RL) and then must wait to reload
-Rocket explosion radius increased
-Rockets take less damage at outer radio
-Flamethrower now burn enemies, cannot teamkill
-Jetpack now can fly for a limited time, solved speed insane abuse and forces players to land to the ground.
-Shield updated to armor, gives stronger protection.
-New car model, with colored teams.
-Added 3DSkybox
-OPtimized map, now less filesize

--v5b--
-Updated flamethrower:
--Fixed bug that makes flamethrower stop firing
--Increased distance of fire
--Easier to burn enemies
-Fixed bug at the textures of wizard staffs

--v6--
-Improved and increased map, improved short battles.
-Improved lighting.
-Added color correction.
-Improved item detail.
Added 3 new items: freezer gun, reflector shield and ubercharge.
-Balanced items:
--Now rockets move a little slower and burn in fire for easier detect.
--Wizard staff has less damage, less radius and slower attack.
--Medkit gives less HP.
-Deleted primary weapons.
-Added balanced weapon system.

--v6b--
-Fixed some items error after the CSS update.
-Fixed bug at reflector shield when reflects lasers.
-More realism at flamethrower attack.
-Cannon now makes an explosion and plays a sound when attacks.
-Freezer gun now freezes for 8 seconds.

This is a medium mg/aim map.
16 CT vs 16 T
The objective of the map is to kill oposite force using weapons and items.
Each force has 16 p228 and 16 items.
To get an item, take the knife inside.

The items are:

Car (2):
Car gives speed to the player who wears it. (Speed x2)

JetPack (2):
The jetpack allows player to fly.
To fly: Use knife secondary attack.
To fly forward: look at the ground.
To fly backwards: look at the sky.
Don't worry if you fall, you will not die.
The jetpack has a Gas tank, when you fly will use the gas, to restore the gas wait, a HUD text will show you the status of the jetpack.

Medkit (2):
Restores player and teammates health (50hp each second).

Mega Laser Dual(2):
Very dangerous.
You can shot laser each 3,5 seconds, when the laser is ready, you will see sparks on the lasers canon.
Caution laser can be used to kill enemies and teammates.
To shot use the knife secondary attack.

Dual Rocket Launcher (2):
Shots 2 explsive rockets at the same time. Very destructive.
Each rocketlauncher has 4 rockets in their clip, to reload rockets wait and dont shoot, a HUD text will notice the numbers of rockets.
Do not fire at a near target or you will die.
To shot use the knife secodary attack.

Canon (1):
This canon can shot one ball each one second (not explosive).
The canon can be used to kill enemies or teammates.
To shot use the knife secondary attack.

Flamethrower(2):
Burn enemies!!!
Unlimited attack, short range.
To fire use knife secondary attack.
Doesnt hurt teammates.

Heavy armor (2):
Protects against weapons, rocket launcher, wizard staff, mega laser dual and canon.
Reduces the field of wiev.
The vulnerable area is the head.
The back is invulnerable.

Wizards staff (1):
Shots a explosive fireball, it destroys everything along its path.
You can use the staff when the light is on.
To make magic use the knife secondary attack.

This is the first map on BlazBlue theme !
It's a mod from the original map mg_item_battle_v4b by Eddie989

In this map, you can found a giant sword in the sky, this giant sword is the Astral Finish of Nu V-12 ! When the map say "Le chauldron BlazBlue est pret !" you can jump into the central cauldron for activate the Astral Finish.

Update :

(b3)

- Astral Finish corrected

(b2)
- Missing Texture corrected
- Time for activate the Astral Finish set to 120 sec

@edit: V2FIX is done! Fixed things:

This is a second version of my map mg_items_fight, and it's propably the last version. 

Everything should work and it shouldn't crash servers, but it isn't tested on a real server so I don't know anything about this.

There are 11 items per team. Every item can be picked up two times, and there is only one Water-Fly item (boss). So there are 21 spawn points per team. 

Max players : 42

To use items now just press Left Mouse Button.

Medic is the only item without usage. (It mean nothing'll happen if you'll press Left Mouse Button). It's just healing / attacking every time.

The best item: Water-Fly

Worst item: Bomb

No music because of map size.

There are 3 different fight arenas and they are choosen randomly every round. Items are randomly choosen too.

People with bad computer can have small amount of FPS when there are about 20+ people.

Hope it isn't crashing your server! Haha ^^

Have fun!

InvisibleMEN is a remake of invisibleman.(http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/181712)
This time its TEAM versus TEAM.

The visible versus invisible

Objectives are as stated:

Invisible: You are invisible, You can only use a knife, You must kill the Visible team.

Visible: You are visible, You can pick up a weapon in the gun room, and ammo at the gun boxes, You must kill all invisible or survive until the helicopter comes.

Please report all bugs to me (steam: Kfitz592) or this page.

Watch video on how to play MG_invisibleMAN, which is the same mapmod as invisibleMEN.
<object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/z2qwJsVmOPc&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0x3a3a3a&color2=0x999999"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/z2qwJsVmOPc&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0x3a3a3a&color2=0x999999" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>

In this map there is one invisible terro and 6 (max) CT .

The terrorist must kill all the CT in 1 min 50 (Before a deadly poison strike) .

If you search weapon , there is 6 M3 in a box at respawn .
Don't forget you don't have any flashlight . Just an (useless ?) nightvision .

A big THANKS TO KFITZ for the invisible system .


FIX :

-Terro will die at the end ;)
-Now terrorist is TOTALLY invisible .



ENJOY !

ALSO check out MG_INVISIBLEMEN, http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/144311

Objective:

General- Kill the opposite team or survive for 3 minutes, Once the helicopter comes get inside to avoid dieing by the poison bomb.
Pick up ammo from the ammo crates.


T's- YOU ARE COMPLETELY INVISIBLE, Your objective is to kill all the CT's before they can escape. You are faster and can jump higher than the CT's this is based on the amount of the ct's though.If you survive for 3minutes get to the helicopter. Once you die you auto join CT.

CT's When you spawn enter the room to your side and select and pick up a weapon. After doing so go out into the playing field and try to survive or kill the invisible man. If you survive for 3minutes get to the helicopter. Once you kill the invisibleman a new invisibleman will be chosen from a random alive CT.

mg_insane

this map is truely insane!!! 70 spawn points, fun with alot of players!!!

all players are respawned in one small room, once the glass is broken, go nuts!!

this map speed is 2.5x the normal speed

the gravity is also very low, so you can run faster, and jump further!

objective of the game is kill till you're the last one standing!
A fast pace map, you spawn with only a machine gun and a knife...watch out though..the other team's base it just around the corner... can you survive?

You start off without a weapon you can either get on the boat and drive it running people over or head for the islands which have different kinds of weapons. (originaly the idea was to have 2 boats in an ocean that fire at eachother, but the physics didn't like this large boat so I gave up on that map and just quickly produced this, but its by far my worst work but good for a few laughs)

A mini game map where you use a custom impact gun to launch your enemies off the platform. You right click to fire the gun. This map took a lot of testing to get it to work flawlessly so please don't steal the gun. Set up for 20 players 10v10. Thanks to Dr.Tran for lots of testing help, Toasty for testing also, and to Borixon for help. 
Skybox by G-Flow
If you like the map please rate and reply.

Mg_impact

=================

A New Mini Game map inspired by Tomgreen and his map mg_impactgun.... 
CTs/Ts have an impact weapon (knife) which push the other person into the sky.
They both must try to push each other down into the big water.
This person who fall down into the water will get 20 HP damage so if you fall 5 times down you will die.
The winning team is this team who have the last standing member. 
Have a lot of fun. :P

Map made by Atrisco, Subway and Noogai
